synopsis.text: In a small Nepalese village overlooking the scenic Himalayas, a young boy named Surya finds a mysterious letter from a princess requesting help. Though timid, Surya is compelled to come to her aid. His search leads him on an adventurous journey into a hidden Himalayan kingdom. Along the way, Surya must find the courage within himself to rescue the princess from whatever peril she faces. With the towering mountains as his guide and the princess's plea as his purpose, Surya discovers inner strength and bravery he never knew he had.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
